column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Before I go into the bathroom I always grab a towel from the linen closet where we keep our towels , soap and shampoo .
#text=I like to put a radio on while I take a bath so I can relax and enjoy myself .
#text=I plug the tub with a water stopper and turn on the water so it 's nice and warm but not too hot .
#text=I put in some bubbles so it makes it nice and bubbly and smelling good .
#text=When the tub is all filled I stop the water and slowly get inside .
#text=I sit down for about ten minutes relaxing with my eyes closed and just thinking about the day .
#text=After about ten minutes I take the stopper out so the tub can drain and turn the shower head on .
#text=I like to wash myself off after a bath because there are a lot of bubbles all over me .
#text=I love taking baths because they are very relaxing .
